channel.title: Connecting problem
channel.description: My server Ip Is 127.0.0.1 I don't know how to change It there's no cilent.java or gui file there only a cilent file also people try to connect to It says error connecting to server but my server Is online Its on moparscape and won't log people In so how should I change the Ip In what file the cilent file? Please tell me what I should do and the steps :D.
